call_for_paper.title: Talks
call_for_paper.subtitle: Call for speakers running...
call_for_paper.summary: Share your experience with the servless community: best practices, products and services you've used with serverless technologies, you name it, we want to hear about it. Submit your talk to become one of our passionate speakers!

cta.alt: Link to the call for speakers

call_to_action.text: Come to network with serverless experts and learn from them during this one-day conference

sponsors.title: Sponsors
sponsors.content: Partner with us to support our community!

title.title: Serverless days
title.subtitle: Join the French Serverless community to learn, grow and network with experts and stay connected by attending our virtual meetups, the first wednesday of each month!

rendez-vous.when: Our next session is happening on the 06/03/2020 at 6pm (CET)

streams.title: Streams
streams.description: Re-live our first remote meetup with Yan Cui, AWS Hero, and Rita Kozlov, PM for Cloudflare Workers
streams.callToAction: If you wish to share your experience in future sessions, don't hesitate to submit your talks, in english or french, to {mailLink}
